text: Ani amhi (tauratamadhye) yahudincya hakkata hi gosta nirdharita keli ki jivacya badalyata jiva, ani dolyacya badalyata dola ani nakacya badalyata naka ani kanacya badalyata kana ani datacya badalyata data ani khasa jakhamancahi badala ahe, maga jo koni tyasa mapha karila tara te tyacyasathi pascattapa ahe ani je loka allahacya adesanusara phaisala karanara nahita tara aseca loka atyacari aheta
